summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsNARS Light Reflecting Eye and Lash Gel is a powerful, quick-absorbing gel formula that gently treats eyes and lashes with an all-in-one formula.
details: DetailsBenefitsRevitalize and refresh the eye area with intense moisture, while improving the look of undereye bagsFeaturing a blend of peptides, Hyaluronic Acid, and Pro-Vitamin B5 to smooth and brighten the eye area, while giving lashes a fuller, longer, thicker lookHyaluronic Filling Spheres lock moisture into skin, while smoothing the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesFeaturesFor all skin typesDermatologist testedNon-comedogenicFormulated without Mineral Oil, Talc, Fragrane, Alcohol, Parabens, Sulfates, and PhthalatesResearch ResultsProvides up to 60 hours of hydration*Improves the look of undereye bags by 49% in just eight weeks**Smooths undereye texture by 42% in just eight weeks**Improves undereye brightness by 38% in just eight weeks***Based on a clinical study of 33 subjects**Based on a clinical study of 55 subjectsItem 2591152How To UseApply a pea-sized dollop all around the eye to treat the undereyes, lids, and crow's feet.To treat lashes, apply only at nighttime, using a fingertip to gently swipe along lash lines.Avoid direct contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Caprylyl Methicone, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Propanediol, Lauroyl Lysine, Trehalose, Camellia Japonica Flower Extract, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Tocopherol, Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Saccharide Isomerate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pantolactone, Sodium Chloride, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Trihydroxystearin, Glucomannan, Peg-8/Smdi Copolymer, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Metaphosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Metabisulfite.Note: NARS products may vary in their formula. Please refer to the packaging for the actual ingredient list.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized dollop all around the eye to treat the undereyes, lids, and crow's feet.To treat lashes, apply only at nighttime, using a fingertip to gently swipe along lash lines.Avoid direct contact with eyes.
ingredients: Sodium Metabisulfite.Note: NARS products may vary in their formula. Please refer to the packaging for the actual ingredient list

reviews.headline: Lasted me over a year
reviews.comments:
It's a lot more pricey than other brands but lasted me well over a year. 
I put it on and then leave a thin layer on my skin to blend with my undereye concealer. It makes it seamless. I finally ran out and had been using some other cream and well. It just didnt stand up at all.

reviews.headline: Great for me!
reviews.comments: I am unable to use almost every eye cream in the market, at any price point...my skin just doesn't like a cream, and I get Milea right away. This one is great for me...light texture that absorbs well and takes concealer beautifully and holds it most of the day. So happy I found something.

reviews.headline: Wow - Amazing
reviews.comments: I was on the fence about buying this because I have a really strong bench of skin care heavy hitters (serums, eye creams, moisturizers, peels, you name it).  I am SO glad I bought this.  It absorbs amazingly well, but beyond that my under eyes have remained moisturized through a 12 hour workday and even after a long nap I woke up to my eyes still looking smooth and plump and moisturized which is even more amazing when you consider it's winter and I've been indoors with the heat pumping.  I came back to buy more immediately.  I hope Nars always makes this!  I am in my early 40s for reference and have dry / combination skin.
